AI Description: py-xlrd is a Python library for reading data and formatting information from Excel files (xls and xlsx). It helps in extracting data from Excel spreadsheets for various data manipulation and analysis tasks.
Core Features: Read Data From Excel Files, Support For Both Older (Xls) & Newer (Xlsx) Excel File Formats, Extract Cell Data, Formatting, Formulas, & More, Handle Large Excel Files Efficiently, Easy Integration With Python Data Analysis Libraries Like Pandas
